data.title: Capital City of Mauritius]
data.meta_description: Capital city information to include weather, map, time, location and capital city name.
data.text: Capital - history named after LOUIS XV, who was king of France in 1736 when the port became the administrative center of Mauritius and a major reprovisioning stop for French ships traveling between Europe and Asia Capital - time difference UTC+4 (9 hours ahead of Washington, DC, during Standard Time)
